long_description: The women's Kuhl Eva Sweater combines the stylish looks and warmth of merino wool with the performance, durability, and easy care of acrylic fleece. Substantial rib-knit sweater features a cozy longer length, full-zip front, hood and oversize cuffs. Soft merino wool is naturally warm, breathable and water resistant. Front 2-way zipper lets you unzip from the bottom as well as the top. Hand pockets feature oversize flaps with metal-snap closure. Kuhl Eva Sweater can be worn as a dress over leggings. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Kuhl Eva Sweater combines the stylish looks and warmth of merino wool with the performance, durability, and easy care of acrylic fleece.
